name: Slides.io
overview:
Slides.io re-envisions the format of presentations. It provides a quick and easy way to create and share interactive presentations online.

The core feature of Slides.io is the ability to broadcast a live presentation and video to anyone, anywhere in the world, on any device. Additional features include tools for enhanced audience interaction, such as chat, polling, and question queueing.

Presentations, source material, questions and answers: everything is recorded and indexed so that valuable information isn’t lost.

Built-in themes are simple, yet elegant, and users have the ability to customize themes to their content. An intuitive interface minimizes learning curve. Users simply log in, create, and present.
